Articles.Content:
After trying to get registered for a couple weeks and running into a few issues (The Great Outage and Mistaken ID of Spammer Fiasco) I'm finally here! I'm totally enjoying the game so far and I can't wait to get involved in the community.

My name is Shayne. I'm from Utah. I work in government. I love gaming, skiing, long walks on the beach, candle light dinners... oh wait! Wrong website.

Anyway, thank for having me!
Welcome. Things are a bit wonky right now. Give everyone some time to filter back in.
